name: Email Notifications For WP ULike
author: Sanjeev Aryal

sections.description:
Send an email notification:

  • To the writers (post authors) whenever they got a like on their post or comment. üëç >> üìß
  • To the administrator regarding how your contents are performing in terms of LIKES – sent weekly.
  • On milestones üèÜ – whenever your (post authors) contents reaches a milestones of 50, 100, or (you set the milestone) LIKES.

WP ULike plugin is required.

Emails are customizable from WP ULike settings.

Follow the documentation for more information.

Contributions of any kind are welcome. Visit the GitHub Repository.
sections.changelog:
1.4.0 – 09/22/2021

  • Feature – Send emails asynchronously.

1.3.0 – 09/14/2021

  • Feature – Milestones.
  • Feature – Templates.

1.2.0 – 09/10/2021

  • Feature – Unsubscription smart tag {unsubscribe}
  • Feature – Weekly summary email
  • Add – Review text at the footer

1.1.3 – 08/29/2021

  • Fix – Work with the default settings.

1.1.2 – 08/29/2021

  • Feature – Settings page to customize emails.

1.1.1 – 08/27/2021

  • Fix – Line breaks in comments.

1.1.0 – 08/27/2021

  • Fix – Send email to post author instead.

1.0.0 – 08/26/2021

  • Initial Release

short_description: Sends email notification whenever you got a like on a post or comment.
